summary: A utility module that defines collections of supported file extensions, MIME types, and categories (audio, image, text, video, Geminiâ€‘compatible) and provides functions to translate between file types, extensions, and MIME types as well as helpers to check a file's category.
business_intent: Standardize file handling across the library, ensuring that APIs receive correctly identified and validated file formats, especially for services that impose strict file type requirements.
